intro:
Chapter One : The Odd One

At the begining there was nothing, and nothing was all.
The elements laid still.

Then The Odd One came, and The Odd One brought the Chaos.
The Chaos created movement, and the elements melted.
It pleased The Odd One and The Odd One molded the Chaos.
The Earth and the other realms were created.

The Odd One chose the inner realm for himself, and left the others
to the other Ones.
The Odd One named himself Dagfin, and the realm Yl'her.
indice1:
Simply fascinating.
Can't believe I'm truly here.
indice2:
I should have taken my charm.
It may have been useful.

clock.question: It seems to be a rusty clock. Should I take it ?

message:
It's still working, but in normal direction... And the speed is not
constant.
I don't have any butter nor jam to repair it.

secret: The distance between these two torches is exactly 9m 3/4...
